title: coreyishaze
author: coreyishaze
content: I came across this forum yesterday, and I haven't been on a SMF board in YEARS. The community seems very well developed and an awesome place to be.If someone can give me a chance to show good merit, I'd greatly appreciate it.Repayment will be next Monday, possibly Friday if a deal I've been working on reaches a final decision.$150 would be ideal, though $100 would suffice.btc address: bc1qt5ttlpnxkvchmsqzrmeqyjadn8rgf34c6t8gvs

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: coreyishaze on October 04, 2022, 11:53:28 PMI came across this forum yesterdayAnd your first though inexplicably is "they must be idiots and give out money to random strangers"  Get out of here.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: coreyishaze on October 04, 2022, 03:35:50 AMI'm in the United States, specifically California.Quote from: coreyishaze on October 04, 2022, 11:53:28 PM$150 would be ideal, though $100 would suffice.You're in California, and have to beg for $150 $100 on the interwebs?  I hear In-N-Out Burger is hiring.And here's a free history lesson from 1940 that eerily persists to remain timely: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=46mO7jx3JEw

comments.author: coreyishaze
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on October 05, 2022, 03:04:10 AMQuote from: coreyishaze on October 04, 2022, 03:35:50 AMI'm in the United States, specifically California.Quote from: coreyishaze on October 04, 2022, 11:53:28 PM$150 would be ideal, though $100 would suffice.You're in California, and have to beg for $150 $100 on the interwebs?  I hear In-N-Out Burger is hiring.And here's a free history lesson from 1940 that eerily persists to remain timely: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=46mO7jx3JEwI am employed... but I literally just switched companies and have to wait two weeks before receiving my paycheck. I work for $28 an hour, it's not great but it's better than In-N-Out, although your smart-ass comment was cute. I'm literally just bad at saving money, if I were good at it then I wouldn't be asking for a small loan.But my bad guys, I didn't realize $100-150 was a bank breaker. I'll make sure to fly a "PLEASE HELP" sign next time at the local 711 after I eat my food stamps pizza and drink my big gulp.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Naturally, you chose to ignore the stickied (SMF - irony) threads and the ground rules of lending in the forum.Tell us about yourself.

comments.author: coreyishaze
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on October 05, 2022, 08:01:29 AMTell us about yourself.Speaking of irony... I actually did just read the rules for lending, and about how collateral is required for non-reputable members.But you're absolutely, 100%, indubitably correct.    I, without a doubt.. naturally chose to ignore the stickied threads which appear at the top of the sub-forum and are clearly marked or pinned. Quote from: Timelord2067 on October 05, 2022, 08:01:29 AMTell us about yourself.You want to know about me? Sure! I just turned 27 at the end of last month. My ex-girlfriend and I bought some wine, got a hotel room out of town then went to an art show / wine-tasting the next day.I've spent my entire life living in California, specifically one of the most crime rated cities per capita in the entire nation.Currently, I am working as the lead maintenance man at a warehouse that holds the items for a large online store. I was doing the same work for another warehouse for the last 2 years but they were not negotiable on pay even after agreeing previously that it would be possible. Besides that, I like to go fishing and I enjoy playing Brawl Stars on my phone.

comments.author: suchmoon
comments.body: Quote from: coreyishaze on October 05, 2022, 07:53:28 AMI'm literally just bad at saving money, if I were good at it then I wouldn't be asking for a small loan.Even if any of your BS was true, this means you're not just "bad at saving money", you're a horrible credit risk. You're either unable to get a credit card or have all of them maxed out.But most likely you're just full of shit to the brim. California, job, girlfriend, hotel, wine, begging. Sounds like someone's imaginary "life in USA".

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: coreyishaze on October 05, 2022, 08:12:21 AMMy ex-girlfriend and I bought some wine, got a hotel room out of town then went to an art show / wine-tasting the next day.Was she your ex-girlfriend at the time, or did the BareFoot at Motel 6 convince her you aren't The One?

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: I'm surprised he didn't wake up with a kidney or two missing...

comments.author: Maasdamer
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on October 05, 2022, 01:59:27 PMQuote from: coreyishaze on October 05, 2022, 08:12:21 AMMy ex-girlfriend and I bought some wine, got a hotel room out of town then went to an art show / wine-tasting the next day.Was she your ex-girlfriend at the time, or did the BareFoot at Motel 6 convince her you aren't The One?4,5 years member, 4800 posts, thats 3 posts a day spamming and also insulting people. U must have the saddest life when you basically life in this forum trolling people.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: You forgot the one hundred times the merits compared to what you have @Maasdamer

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on October 06, 2022, 10:29:48 AMYou forgot the one hundred times the merits compared to what you have @MaasdamerNot quite 100 times if you add up all the merits he's given to his own alts.
